body_html:
Hi,
I have the same exact problem.
On my laptop, everything is fine.
On my cluster login node or computing node, the same segfault as described above. No matter whether I start by import fastText or import torch, the second one fails.

In both cases,
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
conda 4.5.4
fastText installed with pip install -e from last git repo

On my cluster:
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux

On my laptop:
[GCC 4.8.2] on linux

In verbose mode:

>>> import fastText
[...]
>>> import torch._C
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-36.pyc'
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/platform.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/platform.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/platform.cpython-36.pyc'
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/subprocess.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/subprocess.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/subprocess.cpython-36.pyc'
# extension module '_posixsubprocess' loaded from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/_posixsubprocess.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
# extension module '_posixsubprocess' executed from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/_posixsubprocess.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
import '_posixsubprocess' # <_frozen_importlib_external.ExtensionFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbb5e80>
# extension module 'select' loaded from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/select.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
# extension module 'select' executed from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/select.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
import 'select' # <_frozen_importlib_external.ExtensionFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbb5f60>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/selectors.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/selectors.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/selectors.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'selectors' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbc32e8>
import 'subprocess' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbac898>
import 'platform' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdf5de240>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_utils.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_utils.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_utils.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'torch._utils' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbd2cf8>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/version.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/version.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/version.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'torch.version' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbdc160>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_six.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_six.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_six.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'torch._six' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbdc278>
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

Note that pytorch worked perfectly before that fastText import
body_text:
Hi,
I have the same exact problem.
On my laptop, everything is fine.
On my cluster login node or computing node, the same segfault as described above. No matter whether I start by import fastText or import torch, the second one fails.
In both cases,
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
conda 4.5.4
fastText installed with pip install -e from last git repo
On my cluster:
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux
On my laptop:
[GCC 4.8.2] on linux
In verbose mode:
>>> import fastText
[...]
>>> import torch._C
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py

body:
Hi,
I have the same exact problem. 
On my laptop, everything is fine. 
On my cluster login node or computing node, the same segfault as described above. No matter whether I start by `import fastText` or `import torch`, the second one fails.

In both cases, 
Python 3.6.6 :: Anaconda, Inc.
conda 4.5.4
fastText installed with `pip install -e` from last git repo

On my cluster:
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux

On my laptop:
[GCC 4.8.2] on linux

In verbose mode:

```
>>> import fastText
[...]
>>> import torch._C
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-36.pyc'
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/platform.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/platform.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/platform.cpython-36.pyc'
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/subprocess.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/subprocess.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/subprocess.cpython-36.pyc'
# extension module '_posixsubprocess' loaded from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/_posixsubprocess.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
# extension module '_posixsubprocess' executed from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/_posixsubprocess.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
import '_posixsubprocess' # <_frozen_importlib_external.ExtensionFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbb5e80>
# extension module 'select' loaded from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/select.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
# extension module 'select' executed from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/lib-dynload/select.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
import 'select' # <_frozen_importlib_external.ExtensionFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbb5f60>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/selectors.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/selectors.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/__pycache__/selectors.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'selectors' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbc32e8>
import 'subprocess' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbac898>
import 'platform' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdf5de240>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_utils.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_utils.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_utils.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'torch._utils' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbd2cf8>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/version.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/version.py

import 'torch.version' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbdc160>
# /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_six.cpython-36.pyc matches /home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_six.py
# code object from '/home/tannier/conda/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__pycache__/_six.cpython-36.pyc'
import 'torch._six' # <_frozen_importlib_external.SourceFileLoader object at 0x7fffdbbdc278>
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```

Note that pytorch worked perfectly before that fastText import
